title: U.S. drone strikes in Yemen 2011 to 2019
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Number of drone strikes, with a total of 9 data points. The chart has 3 significant trends.
The longest trend is extremely positive which exists from 2017 to 2014.
Likewise, the next significant trend is moderately negative which exists from 2014 to 2011.
But, the next significant trend is slightly negative which exists from 2019 to 2017.
gold: The statistic shows the number of U.S. drone strikes in Yemen from 2011 to November 5 , 2019 . In 2018 , the U.S. carried out a total of 36 drone strikes in Yemen .
